name: semantic-compare
description: Compare version strings according to Semantic Versioning 2.0.0

scripts.test: xo && nyc mocha test/**/*-spec.js && nyc report --reporter=text-lcov | coveralls --force
scripts.checkgit: ([[ $(git rev-parse --abbrev-ref HEAD) == "master" ]] && git diff --exit-code && git diff --cached --exit-code && git diff --exit-code origin/master..master)
scripts.postpublish: git tag v$(jq -r '.version' package.json) && git push --no-verify --tags
